alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:25PM CDT until May 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN FRANKLIN...PHELPS...WESTERN ADAMS...KEARNEY...VALLEY... BUFFALO...SHERMAN...WESTERN HOWARD...EASTERN HARLAN AND WESTERN HALL COUNTIES... At 224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Mason City to 8 miles northeast of Riverdale to Upland, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Pleasanton around 230 PM CDT. Arcadia and Poole around 235 PM CDT. Ravenna, Holstein and Norman around 240 PM CDT. Heartwell around 245 PM CDT. Kenesaw, Rockville and Boelus around 250 PM CDT. Ord, Ashton and Elyria around 255 PM CDT. Wood River, Farwell, Prosser and Fort Hartsuff State Park around 300 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 302. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Franklin; Hall; Harlan; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman; Valley
